title: ♥쉬소리 8시간 델타파,미국 수면의학회 추천 수면음악,백색소음,asmr,빗소리,잠오는영상,잠오는 소리,잠오는 클래식,깊은 수면음악,불면증치료,잠오는 노래 ,잠잘오는음악,잠잘오는노래
description:
절대 중간 광고 넣지 않았습니다. 
혹시 중간 광고 나오시는 분은 유튜브 고객센타에 문의하니
프리미엄을 구독하지 않은 시청자에 한해 
AI가 랜덤으로 광고를 삽입할 수 있다고 합니다.(이점 이해해주세요)
 

여러분들이 많이 좋아해주시던 전설의 쉬소리 수면음악
수정해서 다시 업로드 해드립니다.
불편드려서 죄송합니다.

미국 노스웨스턴 페인버그 의대에서 연구하고 발표한 논문에 의하면
핑크 노이즈 레벨의 소리파동 또는 음향을 잠을 잘 때 듣게 하면

깊은 잠을 들게 해, 기억력을 3배 이상 증진시킨다고 합니다.
건강한 수면은 우리의 면역력을 높여주고 
뇌의 기능을 회복시켜 줍니다.

잠을 자기전 10분정도 따뜻한 족욕과 
따뜻한 물 또는 차한잔을 마시는 습관을 만들어보세요

오늘 하루 열심히 뛰어온 당신이 이 음악으로
편안하고 깊은 잠을 잘수 있기를 바랍니다. ^^

이 영상은 마음토닥에서 직접 현장에 나가서 촬영한
경기도 용인 이동저수지 영상과 빗소리입니다. 
또한 제가 마이크로 직접 녹음한
쉬소리입니다.

📢 마음토닥 소개
당신의 몸과 마음을 성장시키는 채널입니다.
당신이 저와 함께 성장해서 
또 다른 사람에게 밝고 긍정적인 에너지를 전해주면
좋겠습니다. 
나는 언제나 당신편입니다.
사랑합니다. 감사합니다. 고맙습니다. ♥♥♥

 ♣마음토닥에 에너지를 보내주시면 
당신을 위해 에너지를 보내드립니다.

title: [ Library Of Ruina ] Gone Angels
description:
Library Of Ruina _ Boss Theme 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256670/Library_Of_Ruina/

Music - @ProjectMili

Look
이것 봐
One by one
한 장 한 장
The pages remind me you'll always be a villain
넘기는 책장마다 넌 언제까지나 악역으로 남을 거라고 상기시키네
For you, angels have fallen
너를 위해, 천사들이 하늘에서 떨어졌어
Now they're gone
이젠 사라지고 말았네
See? Now they're gone
보여? 이젠 어디에도 없어
Forever gone
영원히 사라졌네
From the hell that served as my one and only home
나의 유일무이한 거처였던 이 지옥으로부터 벗어나
Though it may hurt today
오늘은 비록 아플지라도
Tomorrow I'll be heading my way
내일은 나의 길을 가고 있겠지

I tried, I tried
난 힘냈어, 노력했어
What did we expect?
우린 무얼 기대했던 걸까?
My dearest friend
내 친애하는 친구야
Tell me when we shall make it end
언제 마침표를 찍어야 할 지 부디 알려줘

So let me take your hand
그러니 너의 손을 이리 줘
Like one of those madmen
마치 미치광이처럼
Tip tappity tappity tap
탁 따라락 따라락 탁
Dance our last dance
우리의 마지막 춤을 추며
Sing
노래해
Ta talila lulilatu
타 타리라 루리라투
La tulali lalulilu
라 투라리 라루리루
Spinning vinyl opera
돌아가는 오페라 레코드판

(Lascia ch'io pianga)
(나를 울게 하소서)
Longing for this moment
이 순간을 기다려왔어
(mia cruda sorte,)
(내 잔혹한 운명에,)
Brewing all this hatred
이 모든 증오에 내 가슴을 졸이며
(e che sospiri)
(그리고 한탄으로)
So I have a reason
비로소 나에게
(la libertà.)
(자유를 그리네.)
Reason to see you dead
네가 죽는 꼴을 볼 구실이 생기도록

Don't you worry
걱정은 마
I saved a spot for you in recycle bin
휴지통에 네가 들어갈 자리는 남겨 놓았어
Your neighbouring addresses point to the books you burned
네 옆의 주소들이 가리키는 것은 네가 태워왔던 책들

Stop now
멈춰
One by one
하나하나
Your desires convince me you've always been a human
너의 욕망들은 네가 처음부터 인간이었다고 내게 말하네
For you, the shelves have fallen
너를 위해, 책꽂이들이 무너져갔어
Now they're gone
이젠 사라지고 말았네
See? Now they're gone
보여? 이젠 어디에도 없어
Forever gone
영원히 사라졌네
From the stage that allowed us our one and only dreams
우리의 유일무이한 꿈을 이뤄주었던 이 무대에서 벗어나
What's more to say?
뭐라 더 할 말이 남아 있을까?
Pain always catches up to those who chooses to stay
고통은 언젠가 남겠다고 결정한 이들에게 반드시 따라붙어
Though it may hurt today
오늘은 비록 아플지라도
Tomorrow I'll be heading my way
내일은 나의 길을 가고 있으리

title: 6시간 델타파, 잠잘오는 소리, 빗소리, 잠오는영상, 잠오는 소리, 잠오는 클래식, 깊은 수면 소리, 불면증치료, 잠오는 소리 , 잠잘오는 음악, 백색소음, asmr♥
description:
안녕하세요. Sound of 깊은수면 채널 입니다.
 
더 나은 수면과 불면증 완화를 위해 비의 소리를 들려 드립니다. 땅에 비가 내리는 검정화면 스트레스를 해소하고 외상 후 스트레스 장애 (PTSD), 불안감을 줄이는 데 도움이 될 수 있습니다. 먹을 때, 잘 때, 공부를위한 빗소리는주의를 산만하게 할 수있는 소음을 차단하는 데 도움이됩니다. 위로하는, 진정하는, 차분한 비 소리를 즐기십시오.

미국 노스웨스턴 페인버그 의대에서 연구하고 발표한 논문에 의하면 핑크 노이즈 레벨의 소리파동 또는 음향을 잠을 잘 때 듣게 하면 깊은 잠을 들게 해, 기억력을 3배 이상 증진시킨다고 합니다. 건강한 수면은 우리의 면역력을 높여주고 뇌의 기능을 회복시켜 줍니다.

구독: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJs3...​

동영상에 이야기는 마음의 건강 / 자연의편안함 위해 이야기 하지 않습니다.

Sound of 깊은수면 채널은 엔터테인먼트 목적으로 만 사용되며 의료 조언이나 치료를 대체하는 데 사용되어서는 안됩니다. 심각한 질병이있는 경우 즉시 의사와 상담하십시오. 이 채널을 사용하는 것은 자신의 책임입니다. Sound of 깊은수면 유투브 채널은 제공된 콘텐츠 사용으로 인해 발생하는 손해 또는 부상에 대해 부분적 또는 전체적인 책임을지지 않습니다. Sound of 깊은수면 채널 오디오 / 비디오 녹화를 사용하는 동안 운전하거나 무거운 기계를 작동하지 마십시오.

#soundof깊은수면 #쉬소리 #잠# 비

description:
실제 신경 정신과에서 사용하는 심신 뇌파 안정과 숙면에 효과가 있는 음악 🎵 그것은 당신의 마음을 휴식을 취할 시간이다

안녕하세요 구독자 여러분!

내 채널의 목적은 사람들이 일상생활에서 스트레스를 풀 수 있는 행복한 장소를 만드는 것이다.
나의 음악은 당신이 긴 하루를 보낸 후에 더 쉽게 잠들 수 있도록 도와줄 것이다.

모든 노래는 내가 작곡했다.
무단으로 음악을 사용하지 마세요.
구독과 좋아요는 제가 새로운 음악을 만드는 데 도움이 됩니다.

안녕히 주무세요! 항상 행복하세요!

시청자분의 좋아요 및 공유, 구독은 멍마들에게 큰 힘이 됩니다!

강아지가 5분 안에 잠드는 오르골 연주 음악입니다.
주위 환경을 조용하게 만들고 이 영상의 음악을 강아지에게 들려주세요.
여러분의 사랑스러운 강아지가 오르골 자장가를 듣고 어떻게 반응하는지, 깊은 잠에 빠지는지 살펴보세요.
강아지는 많은 수면시간이 필요해요. 
성인 개는 하루 평균 12 ~ 14 시간, 강아지는 하루에 18 시간 이상 잠을 자야 합니다.
강아지가 편히 잘 수 있도록 이 영상의 음악을 들려주세요~ ^^

※ 볼륨을 줄여주세요~ 사람 기준으로 생각하지 마세요^^ 강아지는 아주 작은 소리도 잘 들립니다~

※ 모든 강아지의 성격과 성향이 다르기에 동일한 영상에 반응을 보이지 않을 수도 있어요. 
이 영상에 반응이 없다면 멍마들 채널의 다른 영상을 보여주세요. ^^

title: 🇰🇷유튜버6인이 부르는 '민중의 노래' 한국어 커버 (Do You Hear The People Sing?)
description:
광복절을 맞아 레미제라블의 Do You Hear The People Sing?을 커버했습니다.

이 넘버는 프랑스의 혁명에 관련해 만들어진 넘버이지만,
가사안에 내포된 의미는 시민들의 자유를 향한 노래이기에
저희가 새기기에도 충분히 공감하고 감동받을수있는 노래라고 생각합니다 .

코로나로인해 각자 집에서 홈레코딩을 하다보니 합을 맞추기 어려워
다들 정말 열심히 준비하고 연습했습니다. 앞으로도 응원많이 부탁드려요:)

title: [힐링트리뮤직] 우와 진짜 놀랍다. 하루10분 만병을 치료 해주는 힐링 명상 기치료 음악 및 영상, 명상음악, 스트레스 해소 음악, 긴장이완음악, 편안한 음악 (치유음악)
description:
[힐링트리뮤직] 우와 진짜 놀랍다. 하루10분 만병을 치료 해주는 힐링 명상 기치료 음악 및 영상, 명상음악, 스트레스 해소 음악, 긴장이완음악, 편안한 음악 (치유음악)
https://youtube.com/live/ee3PFk33aTQ

➤Beautiful Relaxing Piano 채널에 오신 것을 환영합니다!

➤이 채널은 진정, 스트레스 해소 및 영혼 치유를 돕기 위해 만들어졌습니다. 행복한 삶은 마음의 평화를 필요로 합니다. 

➤이곳은 명상과 휴식을 위한 특별한 공간입니다. 저희 채널은 여러분의 일상에서 소중한 순간들을 위한 음악을 제공합니다. "명상음악, 머리가 맑아지는 음악, 행운을 끌어오는 신비한 명상음악, 힐링음악, 머리좋아지는 음악, 뇌에 좋은 음악, 힐링트리뮤직, 마음이 편안해지는 음악, 머리를 맑게 해주는 음악, 두뇌발달에 좋은 음악, 집중력 높이는 음악, 스트레스 해소 음악, 명상음악연속듣기, 명상 음악, 행운음악, 뇌활성화 음악"과 같은 다양한 테마의 음악을 통해 마음과 영혼을 풀어보세요.

➤자신의 이야기를 나누고 호스트와 시청자로부터 큰 에너지와 아름다운 메시지를 받을 수 있는 채널입니다. 

➤우리의 음악은 일상의 소음과 스트레스로부터 탈출하고 싶을 때, 내면의 평화와 조화를 찾고 싶을 때 도움이 될 것입니다. 우리의 명상음악은 마음을 진정시키고 긍정적인 에너지를 불어넣어 주며, 행운과 행복을 끌어오는 길을 열어줄 것입니다.

➤또한, 뇌 활성화와 집중력 향상을 위한 음악도 제공합니다. 당신의 머리와 마음을 강화시키며 창의성과 생산성을 높여보세요.

➤음악에는 국경이 없습니다. 따라서 당신이 누구이고 어디에서 왔는지에 관계없이 이 놀라운 사운드는 당신만을 위해 만들어졌습니다. 

➤구독, 좋아요, 댓글은  많은 원동력이 됩니다!
➤➤➤https://bitly.com.vn/kbyg45

➤감상해주셔서 감사합니다 좋은하루되세요!

title: 전두엽 발달과 집중력의 향상 주의력 결핍 과잉행동장애 (ADHD)등이 완화될 수 있습니다
description:
이 인코딩 영상은 주의력 결핍 및 과잉행동장애에 관한 것으로 전전두엽 피질의 성장을 통한 집중력 회복을 위해 제작되었으며 뇌신경성장인자의 자극을 통해 신경세포의 성장과 손상부위의 회복을 촉진하며 도움을 줄 수 있으나 의학적 치료를 대체할 수는 없습니다.

짧은시간 먼저 사용해 보시고 개인의 반응성과 효과에 따라 시간과 횟수를 늘려주세요. 처음 장시간 사용할 경우 피로할 수 있습니다. 급하게 많은 시간을 사용하는 것 보다 천천히 여유를 갖고 진행하시기를 권해드려요.

지금 채널 맴버십에 가입하시고 앞으로 다양한 혜택을 경험하세요 :
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpGC1BwFMFSX0N-MjejV2mQ/join

copyright 2023브레인소다. All rights reserved. 이 영상에 사용된 이미지 및 음악의 무단 복제 및 사용을 금합니다. 
All composed music and created images are copyrighted by brainsoda. Illegal download and commercial use are prohibited.

📚사용방법

1)🎧사용가능 디바이스: 대부분의 인코딩 영상은 이어폰/핸드폰/스피커 모두 사용할 수 있으나 자세한 것은 각 영상에 더보기란을 보시면 되고요. 효과에 있어서 변형이나 손실을 피하기 위해 가능하면 직접 사용하시거나 유선을 이용해 영상 그대로를 사용하는 것을 권해드려요. 

2)🔊볼륨: 저희 인코딩 영상들은 다른 주파수 채널이나 서브리미널 또는 확언과는 다르게 일반음악처럼 편한 볼륨으로 들어주시면 돼요. 

3)🥛수분: 몸에 반응성이 증가함에 따라 갈증을 느낄 수도 있어서 처음 사용하시는 분들은 수분을 섭취해 주시면 좋아요. 

4)🧪효과: 각 영상마다 조금씩 다를 수 있기 때문에 각 영상의 설명을 참고해 주시고 처음 인코딩 영상을 사용하시는 경우 짧은 영상 2~3개를 먼저 사용해 보시고 개인의 반응성과 컨디션에 따라 시간과 횟수를 조절해 주시는 것을 권해드려요.

5)📜채널특징: 
   종교나 영적인 현상이나 미신과는 관련이 없어요.
   플라시보효과를 목적으로 제작한 영상이 아니며 
   영상의 효과를 위해 각 영상의 목적에 맞는 원리와 연구를 참고하여 제작하고 있어요.
   필요에 따라 명상이나 심상화를 하셔도 괜찮지만 반드시 필요한 것은 아니며 음악 듣듯이 편하게 들으시면 돼요.

6)⏲요청하시는 영상들 중에 보강이 필요하거나 새로 제작해야 하는 경우는 필요한 메커니즘과 논문 등의 자료를 조사한 후 영상과 음악을 직접 제작하기 때문에 시간이 지연되는 경우가 있어요.

수면, 공부, 작업, 휴식, 요가, 스트레칭, 스파, 마사지, 마음의 안정

title: 머리가 맑아지는 숲 속 치유음악 🌲하루10분 만병을 치료 해주는 힐링 명상 기치료 음악 및 영상 - 아침음악, 힐링음악, 명상음악, 스트레스해소음악
description:
머리가 맑아지는 숲 속 치유음악 🌲하루10분 만병을 치료 해주는 힐링 명상 기치료 음악 및 영상 - 아침음악, 힐링음악, 명상음악, 스트레스해소음악
https://youtube.com/live/qntqiR8VyfA

➤Beautiful Relaxing Piano 채널에 오신 것을 환영합니다!

➤이 채널은 진정, 스트레스 해소 및 영혼 치유를 돕기 위해 만들어졌습니다. 행복한 삶은 마음의 평화를 필요로 합니다. 

➤이곳은 명상과 휴식을 위한 특별한 공간입니다. 저희 채널은 여러분의 일상에서 소중한 순간들을 위한 음악을 제공합니다. "명상음악, 머리가 맑아지는 음악, 행운을 끌어오는 신비한 명상음악, 힐링음악, 머리좋아지는 음악, 뇌에 좋은 음악, 힐링트리뮤직, 마음이 편안해지는 음악, 머리를 맑게 해주는 음악, 두뇌발달에 좋은 음악, 집중력 높이는 음악, 스트레스 해소 음악, 명상음악연속듣기, 명상 음악, 행운음악, 뇌활성화 음악"과 같은 다양한 테마의 음악을 통해 마음과 영혼을 풀어보세요.

➤자신의 이야기를 나누고 호스트와 시청자로부터 큰 에너지와 아름다운 메시지를 받을 수 있는 채널입니다. 

➤우리의 음악은 일상의 소음과 스트레스로부터 탈출하고 싶을 때, 내면의 평화와 조화를 찾고 싶을 때 도움이 될 것입니다. 우리의 명상음악은 마음을 진정시키고 긍정적인 에너지를 불어넣어 주며, 행운과 행복을 끌어오는 길을 열어줄 것입니다.

➤또한, 뇌 활성화와 집중력 향상을 위한 음악도 제공합니다. 당신의 머리와 마음을 강화시키며 창의성과 생산성을 높여보세요.

➤음악에는 국경이 없습니다. 따라서 당신이 누구이고 어디에서 왔는지에 관계없이 이 놀라운 사운드는 당신만을 위해 만들어졌습니다. 

➤구독, 좋아요, 댓글은  많은 원동력이 됩니다!
➤➤➤https://bitly.com.vn/kbyg45

➤감상해주셔서 감사합니다 좋은하루되세요!

#힐링음악 #명상음악 #피아노

title: 태교음악 (2시간 연속재생) 임산부 스트레스 감소, 태아 뇌발달에 좋은 태교 음악 - 엄마뱃속 태교명상 / pregnancy music, 수면유도음악, 편안한음악
description:
자연의 소리와 편안한 멜로디의 태교음악입니다.^^
자연의 소리는 1/f 리듬을 가지고 있어서 듣기만해도 알파파가 발생됩니다. 
알파파가 생성되면 마음이 편안해지고 스트레스가 감소됩니다.
틀어 놓고 다른일을 하셔도 좋습니다.
아기도 엄마도 의식하지 못해도 다 듣고 있답니다.

엄마뱃속 태교명상연구소의 태교음악과 함께 행복한 임신기간 보내세요~~~ : )

http://www.prenatalmeditation.com
* 인스타그램
https://www.instagram.com/sufficient_daily_life

title: 부드러운 아침을 위한 명곡 클래식 음악 모음 | 달콤한 클래식 | 새소리 | 힐링
description:
코튼테라스의 남녀노소 모두 부드럽고 달콤한 음악과 함께 가벼운 아침을 맞이할 수 있는 명품 클래식 음악모음입니다.

Play List

[00:00]  1.멘델스존 - 무언가 작품번호 53, 1번 
              / MENDELSSOHN - Song Without Words Op.53 No.1

[02:48]  2.샤를 알캉 - 가곡집 3권 작품번호 65, 1번 (EDIT)
              / ALKAN, CHARLES V - Chants Op.65 No.1 'Vivante' (EDIT)

[05:36]  3.쇼팽 - 즉흥곡 작품번호 51, 3번 (EDIT)
              / CHOPIN - Impromptus No.3 G Flat Maj, Op.51(EDIT)

[10:25]  4.가브리엘 포레 - 뱃노래 작품번호 106b, 12번 (EDIT)
              / GABRIEL FAURE- Barcarolle No.12 in E flat major, Op.106b (EDIT)

[13:35]  5.베토벤 - 바가텔 작품번호 33, 1번 (EDIT)
              / BEETHOVEN - Bagatelle Op.33 No.1 (EDIT)

[16:32]  6.쇼팽 - 마주르카 작품전호 24, 2번 (EDIT)
              / CHOPIN - Mazurka C Major, Op.24, No.2 (EDIT)

[19:25]  7.밀리 발라키레프 - 연습곡 '정원에서'
              / MiILY BALAKIREV - ''In the Garden'', Etude-Idyll

[23:52]  8.가브리엘 포레 - 바카롤 작품번호41, 2번
              /  GABRIEL FAURE- Barcarolle No.2 in G major, Op. 41

[30:41]  9.리스트 - 초절기교 S.136 9번
              / LISZT - Etude in 12 Exercises, S.136, No. 9

[33:49]  10.슈만 - 아라베스크 작품번호 18 (EDIT) 
              / SCHUMANN - Arabeske Op.18 (EDIT)

[38:19]  11.슈만 - 꽃의 노래 작품번호 19 (EDIT)
                /  SCHUMANN - Blumenstuck Op.19  "Flower Piece" (EDIT)


너무 오랜만에 업데이트를 합니다. 그 동안 개인 사정으로 음악 작업을 많이 못했습니다T.T  그래서 이번 영상은 오랜 구독자분들의 기다림을 채워줄 수 있게 신경을 써서 더 정성을 담았습니다.

특히 곡 하나하나에 뮤직비디오를 담아 클래식 음악이 좀더 살아있는 듯 청자 분들께 다가갈 수 있게 했고 선곡과 플레이리스트에 많은 공을 들였습니다.

코튼테라스 클래식은 기존 클래식의 정통성을 따르기 보다 새로 재해석 하고 보다 듣기 쉽게 들을 수 있게 하는 데 중점을 두고 있습니다. 

그래서 이번 영상에 쓰인  음원들 또한 새로이 편곡된 음악들이 많이 포함되 있으며 ALKAN Charles V, GABRIEL FAURE, Mily Balakirev 잘 알려지지 않은  
작곡가들의 명곡들을 찾아서 담았습니다.

차분하고 부드럽지만 경쾌함을 잃지 않는 코튼테라스 아침의 음악들 많이 감상해 주세요~

🔔본 영상에 사용된 음원들은 코튼 테라스에서 리메이크 연주한 곡으로 감상용 이외의 용도로 사용하실 수 없습니다.

🔔 Please subscribe! - 구독과 좋아요는 영상제작에 많은 도움이 됩니다!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZrd...​



즐거운 감상되세요~

All Songs Replayed by Cotton Terrace

Video Clip From - pexels-cottonbro, yegor, rodnae-productions, matthias-groeneveld ETC

title: Relaxing And Sweet Dreams Lullabies 🌙 Brahms Lullaby 🌙 1 Hour of Extremely Calm Baby Music🌙Sleep
description:
Relaxing And Sweet Dreams Lullabies 🌙 Brahms Lullaby 🌙 1 Hour of Extremely Calm Baby Music🌙Sleep
We all struggle being parent to put our babies to sleep. In most cases only few of us might be lucky of getting baby who sleeps easily. And specially to the newborn babies who needs plenty of sleep time for their development. Fairy Bee Lullaby has made lullabies to put your babies to sleep in an easy way so that all the parents will be peace of mind when baby sleeps. Our Sleep music are not only for babies but also for the parents who are tired and don’t get enough time to sleep because of their babies. So, we think of not only to babies but to the parents as well. Fairy Bee Lullaby helps babies to go to sleep, it’s soothing lullabies and relaxing baby music make them sleep in peace. We also suggest our lullabies to use in children’s study which helps them to concentrate on their reading. Just by playing in low volume the lullabies for babies to study when kids are studying it helps to concentrate more and helps to study.


What is lullaby?
Lullabies a songs and music that helps our babies to go to sleep. They not only help to sleep but also helps on their development. Lullabies are used in various forms and melodies around the world from ancient times to calm and make the babies go to sleep faster. We have classic music compositions for babies like Brahms, Beethoven, Mozart, and ancient compositions from around the world which has been practiced from 100s of years back. We also have popular rhymes melodies from around the world which helps babies to love the music which has been loved by many babies. We try to make the music in different patterns so that they get different musical instrument experience and melodies so that your babies go to sleep faster. 

So why Lullabies are important?
The gentle melody and calming lullaby music of Lullabies can help promote relaxation and calmness in babies and make babies go to sleep quicker. Relaxing and soft music for babies promotes comfort, quality sleep, and brain development. Lullaby is very essential to good and soothing sleep for babies. So, lullabies are baby sleep music that helps babies to go to sleep.

Play our Fairy Bee Lullabies for your babies at low volume with all the benefits of music. We hope you will love our lullaby music🎼

title: Relaxing Mozart for Babies
description:
FOLLOW US on Spotify: https://spoti.fi/3EoTAE4
Apple Music: https://apple.co/3qQBw2P

Welcome to our soothing sanctuary of Mozart's melodies, designed to usher your little ones into a world of tranquil dreams and nurture their developing minds. This special compilation harmoniously blends the timeless elegance of Mozart's compositions with the gentle caress of lullabies, creating an idyllic atmosphere for babies to drift off to sleep.

Discover the magic of Mozart for babies—a carefully curated selection aimed at supporting brain development through classical music's proven benefits. Experience the serene symphonies that have enchanted parents and infants alike, offering a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of daily life.

Our video features an array of Mozart's masterpieces, seamlessly woven into lullabies that beckon sleep with their soft, melodious embrace. 

Beyond just a bedtime routine, these baby lullaby songs are a gateway to a world of calm, designed to soothe your baby into a restful sleep. The gentle rhythms and harmonies of Baby Mozart sleep music promise a tranquil soundtrack for your baby's dreams, ensuring a peaceful slumber that contributes to their overall well-being.

Join us on a melodious journey with Baby Mozart, where each composition not only aids in sleep but also enriches your baby's auditory and emotional development. Let the refined artistry of Mozart's music be the guardian of your baby's dreams, cradling them in a lullaby of love and security.

Thank you for choosing our Mozart for Babies video. We hope it brings many nights of peaceful sleep to your family, wrapping your little one in a lullaby of love that echoes the timeless beauty of Mozart's legacy.

Hush little baby don’t say a word,
Mama’s going to buy you a mockingbird.

And if that rocking horse turns over,

title: Make Your Baby Laugh | Music, sounds and visuals that make babies laugh | Goofy Panda Eats Honey!
description:
GOOFY PANDA & BEEBEE 4 Episodes - Eating | Making Music | Hide and Seek | Funny Balloon Sounds

The adventures of Goofy Panda & Beebee!
The new episode where Goofy Panda eats too much honey!

Animations especially produced to make babies laugh. With sounds and visuals that will capture your baby attention and make him smile! Enjoy!

Welcome to NERONI, the best animations for your baby, newborn, toddler, children.

High-contrast color animation with funny sounds that will captivate your baby's attention. This video will encourage visual and auditory development and can help stimulate, soothe and entertain your baby.

Newborn babies can see from birth, but just not as clearly as an older person can. In the first weeks and months, their vision rapidly develop. They start to see bright colors. With proper stimulation, it can help develop your child's brain and eye coordination and help increase your child's curiosity, focus, and memory.

Plenty of research has looked at adults’ emotional responses to music. But research with babies is more piecemeal and eclectic, perhaps reflecting the difficulty of asking them what they like. Researchers know that babies can hear and remember music even while they are still in the womb. And one curious study found that newborn babies prefer Bach to Aerosmith.

title: Music Therapy for babies to Stop Crying Relaxation
description:
Music Therapy for babies to Stop Crying Relaxation

Caring the neonate/the child/is an yeoman task for the new mothers.  Many a time even the experienced mothers finds very difficult to give the smoothening care to the newborns.  Globally it is understood and believed that music gives wonderful effects in managing the child's routines.  Naturally, when the child finds unable to sleep, rather we can put in as, do not know, how to sleep on certain occasions.  On account of this, the child will start crying, it is the way of communication for the child, and nothing in the globe will be feasible to enable the child, and help to stop crying, and make him to sleep.  But to everybody's surprise, the music presented in this album ensures easy sleep for he child.

The regular exposure to this music ensures effectives cycle of sleep and agile in the child's behavior.  The natural combinations of notes gives the needed comfort to the child through the auditory system.  It has been proved clinically that, minimum 18 + hours of sleep in a new bron helps to attain better cognitive levels at later stage of development.  The music selected in this album helps the child to sleep well adequately.

The research has been carried our by Dr.T.Mythily PhD, a Research scholar, a Cognitive Neuro Psychologist, and Music Therapist.  A Doctoral Degree holder in Psychology with Classical music and its therapentic values for the improvement in the behavior.  She is a graded artist by AIR, a performing vocalist, She is a disciple of the performing phenmena of the century, world celebrity, Chevalier, the legend Padmavibhushan Dr.M.Balamurali Krishna.

Now that you are tucked up tight
Daddy wishes you goodnight

Mia
Hush little Max and don’t you cry
Magic birds fly in the sky
When those birds all fly away
See the bunny rabbits play

When the rabbits jump and run
Watch these puppies having fun
Puppies are a lovely sight
Magic animals say goodnight

Mum
Hush little Mia go to sleep
Close your eyes and don’t you peep
Now that you are tucked up tight
Twinkle wishes you goodnight

_______________________________________________

LittleBabyBum is an animated musical show that celebrates early childhood experiences and supports cognitive development through loveable characters, relatable stories, and the magic of song, repetition, rhythm, and rhyme.

title: How To Calm A Crying Baby - Dr. Robert Hamilton Demonstrates "The Hold" (Official)
description:
Dr. Hamilton, a pediatrician in Santa Monica, CA and founder of Pacific Ocean Pediatrics, shows you how to calm a crying baby using "The Hold".
This technique has been utilized by Dr. Hamilton to quiet infants during office visits. Parents have learned it and have experienced great success at home. You can too. 

More recently, Dr. Hamilton has written a new book entitled, "7 Secrets Of The Newborn", a guide that walks new and expectant parents through the first year of life with their new baby. 
Dr. Hamilton's 30+ years of experience and his love for babies shines through in the book. It is also the perfect gift for new mommies and daddies, baby showers, and even grandparents. 

Available in hardcover, audio or e-book,  you can purchase the book here:
https://www.amazon.com/Secrets-Newborn-Happy-Surprises-First/dp/125011442X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1539985582&sr=8-1&keywords=7+secrets+of+the+newborn

Looking for pediatrician approved products for your baby? Dr. Hamilton has launched Hamilton Babies! Starting with our new line of naturally-formulated skin and hair care products, our mission is to help keep baby healthy, happy and thriving with each new day. You can learn all about the products here:
https://hamiltonbabies.com/collections/products 

Dr. Hamilton has a new podcast! "The Hamilton Review: Where Kids & Culture Collide" is a show that features accomplished and interesting guests discussing all things kids and culture. The Hamilton Review is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify and Google Podcasts. Subscribe for new episodes that air every Tuesday.
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-hamilton-review/id1496865719


SUBSCRIBE to this channel for more baby content!







Please note: all rights reserved. Do not copy and upload this video to anywhere without written permission.

title: Good Manners Song | Don't Cry Baby - Lalafun Nursery Rhymes
description:
In this video, your child will learn the importance of good manners and how to comfort a crying baby through engaging and fun activities. We understand the challenges of teaching kids good behavior, so we've designed this video to make it easy and entertaining for children to learn. With catchy songs, colorful animations, and relatable examples, your child will not only learn good manners but also how to show empathy towards others. Watch and join us in this exciting adventure of discovering the power of kindness and empathy!

Song Lyrics:
My baby, My baby, please, don't cry
I'll take care of you, I will try
You are my honey and you are my sun
Let's play together and have some fun

My baby, My darling, I'm with you
You are so sad and I'm too
Please, stop crying and play with me
All together like we used to be

title: Rock-a-bye Baby | CoComelon Nursery Rhymes & Kids Songs
description:
Baby doesn’t want to go to sleep tonight.  Mommy sings this classic lullaby to help him feel sleepy.
https://www.youtube.com/c/Cocomelon?sub_confirmation=1

Lyrics:

Rock a bye Baby in the tree top
When the wind blows, the cradle will rock
When the bough breaks, the cradle will fall
And down will come baby, cradle and all

Baby is drowsing, cozy and fair
Mother sits near in her rocking chair
Forward and back the cradle she swings
Though baby sleeps, he hears what she sings

Rock a bye Baby, do not you fear
Never mind, Baby, Mother is near
Wee little fingers, eyes are shut tight
Now sound asleep until morning light

About Cocomelon:

Where kids can be happy and smart!

At Cocomelon, our goal is to help make learning a fun and enjoyable experience for kids by creating beautiful 3D animation, educational lyrics, and toe-tapping music. 

Kids will laugh, dance, sing, and play along with our videos, learning letters, numbers, animal sounds, colors, and much, much more while simply enjoying our friendly characters and fun stories.

We also make life easier for parents who want to keep their kids happily entertained, giving you the peace of mind that your children are receiving quality educational content.  Our videos also give you an opportunity to teach and play with your children as you both watch!

title: Wheels on the Bus | @CoComelon Nursery Rhymes & Kids Songs
description:
Bounce along in the bus all over town with this favorite nursery rhyme!
https://www.youtube.com/c/Cocomelon?sub_confirmation=1

Lyrics: 

The wheels on the bus go round and round
Round and round
Round and round
The wheels on the bus go round and round
All through the town

The doors on the bus go open and shut
Open and shut
Open and shut
The doors on the bus go open and shut
All through the town

The wipers on the bus go swish, swish, swish
Swish, swish, swish
Swish, swish, swish
The wipers on the bus go swish, swish, swish
All through the town

The signals on the bus go blink, blink, blink
Blink, blink, blink
Blink, blink, blink
The signals on the bus go blink, blink, blink
All through the town

The horn on the bus goes beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
The horn on the bus goes beep, beep, beep
All through the town

The motor on the bus goes vroom, vroom vroom
Vroom, vroom, vroom
Vroom, vroom, vroom
The motor on the bus goes vroom, vroom, vroom
All through the town

The people on the bus go up and down
Up and down
Up and down
The people on the bus go up and down
All through the town

The babies on the bus go “Wah, wah, wah!”
“Wah, wah, wah!”
“Wah, wah, wah!” 
The babies on the bus go “Wah, wah, wah!”
All through the town

The mommies on the bus go “Shh, shh, shh!”
“Shh, shh, shh!”
“Shh, shh, shh!”
The mommies on the bus go “Shh, shh, shh!”
All through the town

The daddies on the bus go “I love you!”
“I love you!”
“I love you!”
The daddies on the bus go “I love you!”
All through the town

About Cocomelon:

Where kids can be happy and smart!

At Cocomelon, our goal is to help make learning a fun and enjoyable experience for kids by creating beautiful 3D animation, educational lyrics, and toe-tapping music. 

Kids will laugh, dance, sing, and play along with our videos, learning letters, numbers, animal sounds, colors, and much, much more while simply enjoying our friendly characters and fun stories.

We also make life easier for parents who want to keep their kids happily entertained, giving you the peace of mind that your children are receiving quality educational content.  Our videos also give you an opportunity to teach and play with your children as you both watch!

WEBSITE: http://www.Cocomelon.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/Cocomelonkids
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/cocomelon_official/
TWITTER: https://www.twitter.com/Cocomelonkids

title: Classroom Music For Kids | Distraction-Free Instrumental Covers Playlist | 2 Hours
description:
Looking for the perfect background music to create a distraction-free and inspiring classroom environment? Look no further than these education-friendly tunes, featuring two hours of relaxing and upbeat instrumental covers of hit songs. This carefully curated playlist is designed to enhance focus, creativity, and engagement in the classroom.

With no vocals, this playlist is perfect for fostering an environment where kids can concentrate on their studies or work on group activities. Turn your classroom into a space where curiosity and imagination thrive! Let the sounds of the cello and piano inspire creativity and productivity in your young learners.

And the little one said

I’m scared, I’m scared!

So one got in and 
Now there’s two!

And the little one said

I’m scared, I’m scared!

So one got in and 
Now there’s three!

There were three in the bed
And the little one said

I’m scared, I’m scared!

So one got in and 
Now there’s four!

There were four in the bed
And the little one said

I’m scared, I’m scared!

So two got in and 
Now there’s six!

There were six in the bed
And the little one said

I’m scared, I’m scared!

So one got in and
Now there’s seven!

There were seven in the bed
And the little one said

I’m scared! I’m scared!

So one got in and
Now there’s eight!

There were eight in the bed
And the little one said

I’m scared! I’m scared!

Now there’s ten!

—————LiaChaCha—————
Welcome to LiaChaCha, where we invite you into the world of Lia and ChaCha, adorable twins navigating the ups and downs of siblinghood. Join us as we explore their playful interactions, from squabbles to moments of sibling love, and witness how they navigate relationships with their sibling, relatives, and friends.

At LiaChaCha, we believe that learning is most effective when it's enjoyable. That's why we curate content that not only entertains but also imparts valuable lessons, making the learning experience both fun and enriching. Our videos are crafted to help toddlers connect with everyday life in an exciting way, fostering discovery and learning through play.

Join us on LiaChaCha, where parents and babies come together for a unique experience of connection, education, and shared laughter. Let's learn, grow, and make memories together!

title: 경쾌한 아침을 여는 명곡 클래식 음악 모음 | 밝은 클래식 | 숲속 새소리 | 힐링
description:
상쾌한 아침 🐦새소리와 함께 가벼운 시작을 느낄 수 있는 클래식 피아노 모음집입니다.

모짜르트,베토벤,바흐,하이든,멘델스존 등 이름만 들어도 알만한 유명한 클래식 전설들의 곡중 밝고 신나는 음악들을 모았습니다.

🎵정식 음원출시!

-코튼 테라스에서는 유투브 음원 공개 후 정식 앨범 출시를 병행하고 있습니다.
그 중 첫 번째로 출시한 '경쾌한 아침 클래식' 앨범이 2021년 12월 23일에 정식 런칭하였습니다.
효과음 없이 깨끗한 원음 사운드를 위해 새롭게 리마스터링 하고 디테일한 편곡을 가미하였습니다.
음원 출시 앨범명은 '피아노의 테라스- 나의 경쾌한 아침을 부탁해!' 이며 각종 음원 사이트에서 
만나보실 수 있습니다.
유투브 음원과는 다른 고퀄 사운드의 정식 앨범도 함께 사랑해 주세요!

멜론-https://www.melon.com/album/detail.htm?albumId=10822109#
벅스-https://music.bugs.co.kr/album/20441111?wl_ref=list_tr_11_search
지니뮤직-https://www.genie.co.kr/detail/albumInfo?axnm=82452252
플로-https://www.music-flo.com/detail/album/edoaznhhy/albumtrack

소규모 챔버 오케스트라 형식으로 구성되 무겁지 않고 경쾌하고 밝은 사운드와 클래식 곡들로 구성되 있습니다. 유명 클래식곡들의 밝은 악장 주요테마를 추리고 편곡해 전체 앨범의 분위기를 통일하였고 앨범 제목처럼 아침에 듣기 좋은 구성으로 각색하였습니다. 
즐감해 주세요~

🔔본 영상에 사용된 음원들은 코튼 테라스에서 리메이크 연주한 곡으로 감상용 이외의 용도로 사용하실 수 없습니다.

🔔 Please subscribe! - 구독과 좋아요는 영상제작에 많은 도움이 됩니다!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZrd...​

ㆍ
연습은 배신하지 않네요~ 꼬꼬마들이 라고 이야기 하지 않겠습니다~🤣 우리 신데렐라 배우님들 찐 고생했또용~ 💕

ㆍ

'효녀심청'에 출연했던 '엘리트 클래스'형님들 못지않은 열정과 귀여움으로 꽁꽁 무장한 꼬꼬마들~!!
ㆍ
판타지 뮤지컬 '신데렐라' 
막내들 작품이지만 효녀심청의 뒤를 이을 높은 퀄리티의 이야기와 창작 음악,,그리고 특수효과까지~!!
많이 많이 기대해 주세요^^
ㆍ
(뮤지컬 클래스는 기초반 수업후 오디션을 통해 선발 되며 1년 안에 창작 뮤지컬 한편을 만들게 됩니다.-웃는아이 "효녀심청 "참고 )

*신데렐라 - (이나율)  
*새엄마 -  트레메인 (윤소령)  
*언니들 - 룰루,랄라,릴리 (공유주,김소율,지연우)
*신데델라의 절친(생쥐) - 페파,로니 (황세린,김시우)
*신데델라의 절친(파랑새) - 민트,초코 (오하라,강민서)
*왕자 - 앙드레 (이상준)
*엄마 - 세린느 (손송하)
*요정여왕 - 엘리샤 (홍루하) 
*어린시절 신데렐라 (이예율)
*왕궁기사 – 제인 (황은하) 엠마 (김지윤)

Welcome to 'Happy Baby Sleep,' a soothing haven of lullabies curated to help your little ones drift off into a peaceful slumber. Our carefully selected melodies, including the timeless compositions of Mozart, are tailored to create a calming atmosphere that promotes relaxation and stimulates your baby's intelligence. Join us on this enchanting journey as we combine the power of music with the tranquility of lullabies, providing the perfect backdrop for your baby's bedtime routine. Let our gentle rhythms and harmonious tunes create a serene environment, ensuring a soothing and restful sleep for your baby and a peaceful night for the whole family.

Your little one will love to sing and dance along with this educational, fun video, full of the best music for kids! This song is about The Wheels on The Bus and has lyrics that help children with language development. We know you’ll love our kids songs that we picked out for the most fun and learning possible! They make us happy and we know they will make you happy to! We create arrangements and videos that are Broadway level that are enjoyable for little ones and their parents. You will love our friendly cast of characters. We took the most popular nursery rhymes and songs for kids and put them together into the best mix! While Ms Rachel does gestures, you will also learn about the bus and the parts of the bus through our simple animation. Our goal is to help little ones and their grown-ups learn and thrive! Sing and dance along with us! We love taking our spin on classic nursery rhymes. We also introduce new nursery rhymes. Ms Rachel loves your smart, wonderful babies and believes they are precious and can be anything they dream to be! Check out more of our videos and learn letters, numbers, animals sounds, colors, how to talk, phonics, speech, preschool lessons and more! We hope you’ll join us! Thank you for this opportunity and we hope you watch together. 

Check out our YouTube for more videos that help with language, play, learning letters, numbers, animal sounds, colors, sign language, baby learning and more! Ms Rachel loves to teach you and learn with you! Play along with her many educational videos for kids. Visit Songs for Littles, where you and your little one are so loved and appreciated!  At Songs for Littles, we take education seriously. We work hard to make the most educational content. We love all of the parents and teachers that are part of the Songs for Littles family! We are so honored that children around the world enjoy our highly educational show! We know this mix will be loved by children and their parents! description:

Release : 12-09-2018
DOWNLOAD ALBUM : https://www.melon.com/album/detail.htm?albumId=10203428


#동요 #동요싱싱 #인기동요베스트

영유아부터 초등학생까지 재미있고 신나는 동요, 
IQ, EQ발달에 도움이 되는 명품동요
'동요싱싱(singsing)' 인기동요 Best 100 발매

아이들에게 가장 친숙하고 필요로 하는 동요 100곡을 선별하여 유치원 어린이집에서, 아이들의 아침 기상시간에, 지루한 차안에서, 엄마아빠와 함께하는 휴일에 재미있게 듣고 쉽게 따라부를 수 있도록 담아낸 인기동요집 동요싱싱(singsing) 정규앨범이 발매되었습니다.
유치원에서 배우는 익숙한 동요들, 엄마 아빠와 함께 부를수 있는 친숙한 동요들, 아이들의 교육효과에 좋은 학습용 동요들을 다양한 편곡과 악기들을 활용하여 정성스럽게 만들었습니다. 동요싱싱(singsing)의 첫번째 앨범은 소중한 우리 아이들에게 들려줄 명품동요를 찾던 선생님들과 부모님들에게 꼭 필요한 앨범이 될 것입니다.

Our carefully curated Mozart composition is designed to create a serene atmosphere, promoting relaxation and tranquility. The harmonious melodies gently guide your baby into a deep, restful slumber, ensuring a peaceful night's sleep for both baby and parents.
Research has shown that exposing infants to classical music, such as Mozart, can have a positive impact on their brain development. Our video aims to provide this enriching experience, helping to stimulate your baby's intelligence while they sleep.
Press play and let the timeless melodies of Mozart work their magic, creating an ambiance of serenity and fostering your baby's intellectual growth. Subscribe to our channel for more soothing lullabies and sleep-inducing music to make bedtime a blissful experience for your little one.
Give your baby the gift of sweet dreams and enhanced intelligence with 'Mozart for Babies Intelligence Stimulation.' Thank you for choosing our channel to accompany your parenting journey.

title: Baby Learning With Ms Rachel - First Words, Songs and Nursery Rhymes for Babies - Toddler Videos
description:
Have your baby or toddler learn with a real teacher, Ms Rachel! In this video Ms Rachel will teach key milestones and model activities that promote your baby’s brain growth and development. Babies can watch and learn while caregivers also learn the best ways to play, interact and promote learning throughout the day. 
Ms Rachel is a master at encouraging speech, language development, imaginative play, social emotional development and is always sneaking in important learning concepts! Ms Rachel’s methods and curriculum are backed by experts and research in the early childhood development field.

If your child is not meeting milestones, let your pediatrician know and call early intervention for your state. Your child may qualify for free or low cost therapies such as speech therapy, occupational therapy and physical therapy. You can also contact a private speech therapist (speech language pathologist) for an evaluation. It’s best to act early and get your child help as soon as possible. 

In this video Ms Rachel models: 

First words such as mama, dada, uh-oh, ball, animal sounds, and car sound effects 

First sentences such as “What’s that?” “I did it” and “I want toys!” 

Gestures, which are shown to promote language development (Babies who use more gestures 9-16 months use more verbal language two years later) You can try for 16 gestures by 16 months old. 

Milestones such as clapping, waving, copying gestures, blow a kiss, point to one or more body parts, shaking head “no,” nodding “yes,” pointing with index finger, hold a toy and shake it, give a high five, quiet sign, smile at people, copy facial expressions like smiling and frowning, find hidden things easily, knows what things are for such as a telephone, brush and spoon. 

Fun games to play with baby such as Peek-A-Boo, Pat-A-Cake, This Little Piggy, Blowing bubbles, rolling a ball, with baby, stacking blocks, using shape sorters, puzzles and more! 

Fun songs that promote learning and language such as 

Wheels on The Bus
Peek A Boo Song 
Open Shut Them 
If You’re Happy And You Know It Clap Your Hands 
If You Should Meet An Elephant
We’re Waving
ABCs (The Alphabet Song)
The Itsy Bitsy Spider
Walking Walking 
The More We Get Together 
London Bridges
Row Row Row Your Boat
Baby Put Your Pants On
The More We Get Together 
Shake Your Shaker 
Tick Tock, Tick Tock, I’m A Little Cuckoo Clock 
Round and Round the Garden 
Put Your Stuffy on Your Heart 
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star 
Icky Sticky Bubble Gum 
Hop Little Bunnies
5 Littles Fishies Swimming in the Sea
Hurry Hurry Drive The Fire Truck 

Bain development tips such as 

Read, sing and talk to your baby
Sing songs with simple gestures 
Label parts of body with child 
Give age appropriate toys to explore 
Talk and play with baby during dressing, feeding, bathing
Respond to what baby points to and talk about it 
Play on floor with baby 
Narrate your day like a sportscaster 
Respond to baby’s cries, soothe them 
Give child lots of hugs and kisses 
Play with blocks and shape sorters so child uses their hands 

Nursery Rhymes, Finger Plays and Tickles such as: 
These Are Babies Fingers
The Moon Is Round As Round Can Be 
Toast In The Toaster
How Big Is Baby? So big! 
Garden Snail and Quick Mouse 
You Be The Ice Cream 
Pizza Baby 
Trot Trot To Boston 
Aka Backa Soda Cracker 
5 Little Monkeys Jumping On The Bed 
A Quiet Little Mouse

We have the best educational videos for toddlers and learning videos for kids. 

Teacher Rachel loves you and is so proud of you!

title: Mozart for Babies brain development -Classical Music for Babies-Lullabies for Babies
description:
Mozart effect for Babies brain development -Classical Music for Babies-Lullabies for Babies Sleep Baby Songs-Efecto mozart para estimular la inteligencia de mi bebe-http://youtu.be/XjbJZ-8vH8Q

Follow me on twitter :D: https://twitter.com/amorycuidados

The Mozart effect was first reported in 1993 by scientists at the University of California at Irvine, and replicated by the same group in 1995. The study (which did not look at the effect of Mozart on babies) found that college students who listened to a Mozart sonata for a few minutes before taking a test that measured spatial relationship skills did better than students who took the test after listening to another musician or no music at all.

The effect in the students was temporary (it lasted only 15 minutes) and has always been controversial. Nonetheless, the media and politicians hopped on the Mozart effect bandwagon, claiming that listening to the music offered numerous benefits and could alleviate physical and mental health problems.

The notion that babies would be smarter if they listened to classical music was born out of this hype. One year, the governor of Georgia mandated that a classic music CD — which contained the sonata and other pieces and was donated by Sony — be given to all new babies when they left the hospital.

Despite popular sentiment, the evidence that listening to classical music made anybody smarter was tenuous at best. The lead researcher in the original U.C. Irvine study himself said in a Forbes article that the idea that classical music can cure health problems and make babies smarter has no basis in reality, even though he believes that listening to a Mozart sonata can prime the brain to tackle mathematical tasks.

The researchers at Appalachian State University were unable to duplicate the original "Mozart effect" results and found that the presence or absence of classical music didn't significantly affect student performance on tests. Their results were published in the July 1999 issue of the journal Psychological Science.

title: Baby Songs and Nursery Rhymes- Baby Videos for Babies and Toddlers -  Toddler Learning Video
description:
This is a compilation of the very best baby songs and nursery rhymes for teaching babies and toddlers language, gestures, pretend play, speech and make them squeal with delight! These are taught to your baby by a real music teacher, Ms Rachel, who has a masters in music education and is a music teacher who has taught live baby, toddler and preschool music classes. Music is a phenomenal way to encourage milestones such as gestures, speech, pretend play and joint attention. It’s also great to have a real person showing the gestures to your child instead of a cartoon. They are more easily able to mimic the motions and hear the language!

Ms. Rachel picked this list carefully because of these baby song’s ability to teach language, animal sounds, gestures, body part names, pretend play, milestones like clapping and baby sign language. 

Hop Little Bunnies 
Itsy Bitsy Spider 
Open Shut Them 
Icky Sticky Bubblegum 
Wheels on the Bus 
5 Little Ducks
Hurry, Hurry Drive the Firetruck 
Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes 
Patty Cake, Patty Cake Bakers Man
Old MacDonald 
If You’re Happy and You Know It 
Patty Cake 
Baby Shark 
Bubble, Bubble Pop 
Bingo 
We Are The Dinosaurs by Laurie Berkner 
Where is Thumbkin? 
Row Your Boat 
Zoom, Zoom, Zoom We’re Going To The Moon
The More We Get Together 
Once I Caught A Fish Alive 
Train Song
Mary Had A Little Lamb
5 Little Monkeys Swinging From A Tree
If All The Raindrops Were Lemondrops and Gumdrops
Here We Go Looby Loo 
The ABCs (The Alphabet Song) 
Baby Beluga 
5 Little Monkeys Jumping on The Bed 
A Quiet Little Mouse 
1, 2 Buckle My Shoe 
5 Little Hotdogs 
Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear Turn Around 
Monkeys (Spoken Version) 
Baby Sign Language Songs
Brown Bear Brown Bear What Do You See book with song 

Tips: 
You can sit behind your baby and, hand over hand, help them do the gestures - (if they enjoy that) 
Don’t bounce them around unless they have head control - not for newborns 
Be animated and enthusiastic when you sing to babies 

Other fun ideas: 
Add bubbles to your music play with your child 
Add colorful scarves and dance around with them, play peek-a-boo with them 
Have stuffed animals play along, make stuffed animals clap and do gestures 
If walking, march around to the beat of the music

If working on speech development with a toddler, sing slow and leave out the last word of the phrase of the song! (See “Brown Bear, Brown Bear” at the end of this video for example) 

"Georgie" puppet  Copyright 2016 - David Fino & The Brooklyn Puppet Conspiracy.  Used with Permission.

We also have many more baby videos for babies and toddlers on our channel. We also have toddler learning videos. We have full baby music classes and full toddler music classes. We have many videos with fun baby songs and toddler songs, and we also have videos that aim to help with speech development and first words. 

We also have preschool videos for preschoolers. These are great videos for teacher toddlers preschool readiness skills! They are full of preschool lessons that are great for 1 year olds, 2-year-olds, 3-year-olds, 4 year olds and even 5-year-olds or older! We also have preschool music classes and circle time videos. 

Rachel teaches preschool music to young kids, toddlers, and babies and has a master's in music education from NYU. She has also been a toddler teacher at a school for children with special needs including autism, apraxia, speech delays, developmental delays, Down syndrome and cerebral palsy. 

Many people are involved in designing our videos. On our team we have: speech-language pathologists, a reading specialist, a Broadway musician, an early childhood curriculum specialist, a child and family therapist, and award-winning songwriters! 

If you have a baby, 1 year old, 2-year-old, 3-year-old, 4-year-old or 5 year old, our channel is perfect for you! These are some of the best educational videos for kids you will find. 

#babysongs #babyvideos #babyvideosforbabiestowatch #toddlervideos #babymusicclass #preschoolmusic #preschoolvideos 

Rachel teaches preschool music to young kids, toddlers, and babies and has a master's in music education from NYU. She has also been a toddler teacher and has a sweet 2-year-old boy who inspired her online baby music classes and learning videos!

description:
Homepage (이로운닷미): https://www.eroun.me
로운맘이 추천하는 책과 제품을 큐레이션 확인 후 할인가로 구매할 수 있는 편집샵

Instagram: @rounmom_market
로운맘과 미쿡이모가 함께하는 인스타그램 계정
(공구 소식은 이곳에서~)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

안녕하세요!

3주 전 둘째맘이 된 로운맘이에요. 지난주 조리원 퇴소 후 현재 입주 산후관리사님과 지내고 있는데요~

이게 웬걸! 3주가 넘어가니 순둥인 줄 알았던 우리 둘찌가 밤낮이 바뀌려고 하면서..잠투정으로 어찌나 칭얼칭얼 하는지😭 (그러면서 점점 데시벨 업업⬆️⬆️)

근데 이때! 저희 산후관리사님이 다른 아기들에게도 모두 통한 비법이 있다며 이 소리를 아기에게 들려주시는 데...
오 마이?!!!! 
이 소리를 들은 우리 둘찌! 울음을 뚝 그치더니 스물스물 눈꺼풀이 내려오지 않겠어요?!!😂


이 마법의 소리! 관리사님께 녹음 좀 하겠다고 양해 구한 후 얼른 녹음해서 저희 로운맘 구독자님들께 공유해요~!
칭얼대는 아기, 혹은 나라 잃은 듯 통곡하는 아기에게 까지 효과만점 백색소음이니 주저없이 한번 사용해 보세요^^ 아기가 울음을 멈춘 후 눈이 스물스물 감긴 후에도 몇분 더 들려주세요~ 잠이 푹 들 때 까지요🥰

주목: 눕히면 깨고 눕히면 깨고, 눕깨를 반복하는 아기에게는 하와이바다 백색소음을 쭉 들려주세요~ 서서히 집중하며 잠드는 효과를 기대해 볼 수 있답니다^^ (아래링크 클릭!)

title: [광고없음] 고양이 진정을 위한 부드러운 하프 소리🐈심리안정에 도움을 주는 음악,고양이가 좋아하는,고양이가 반응하는 음악
description:
고양이는 종종 매우 활동적인 것으로 알려져 있지만 사실은 대부분의 고양이가 매우 평화롭다는 것입니다. 고양이 진정을 위한 부드러운 하프 소리는 고양이의 속도를 늦추고 긴장을 푸는 데 도움이 될 수 있습니다. 이 비디오에서는 이 소리를 사용하여 애완 동물을 진정시키는 데 도움이 되는 단계를 안내합니다.

이번 영상은 고양이가 잠들 수 있도록 도와주는 부드러운 하프 소리입니다. 이것은 그들이 긴장을 풀고, 잠을 자고, 평온함을 느끼는 데 도움이 될 것입니다. 이것은 고양이의 편안한 수면을 위한 훌륭한 소리입니다.

이번 영상은 고양이를 위한 깊은 최면 하프 사운드입니다. 고양이의 긴장을 풀고 평화로운 하루를 보내세요.

이 비디오는 부드럽고 편안합니다. 그것은 고양이의 불안과 스트레스를 완화하는 데 도움이 되는 부드러운 방식으로 연주되는 하프를 특징으로 합니다. 이 영상은 밤에 휴식을 취하거나 주말에 긴장을 푸는 데 도움이 되는 소리가 될 것입니다.

고양이 진정을 위한 부드러운 하프 소리는 고양이가 잠들 수 있도록 도와주는 편안하고 부드러운 소리입니다. 부드러운 하프 수면 소리는 저녁이나 밤에 사용하기에 적합하며 이 부드러운 하프 소리를 컴퓨터, 휴대폰 또는 태블릿에서 간단히 스트리밍하여 취침 시간 또는 휴식 보조 장치로 사용할 수 있습니다.

고양이를 진정시키는 "부드러운 하프 소리". 내 고양이는 이 노래를 정말 좋아하지만, 나는 그녀가 듣기에 싫증이 나서 자신을 다치게 할 때 고소당하고 싶지 않습니다.

고양이는 조용하고 생물을 돌보기가 쉽지만 때로는 소음 때문에 잠을 잘 수 없습니다. 이 비디오에서는 부드러운 하프 소리를 사용하여 고양이를 진정시키는 방법을 보여 드리겠습니다.

당신은 당신의 고양이를 위한 완벽한 진정 음악을 찾고 있습니다... 당신은 당신의 고양이를 깊은 잠에 빠뜨릴 적절한 노래를 원할 뿐 광고는 원하지 않습니다. 고양이를 진정시키는 부드러운 하프 소리가 당신을 도와줄 것입니다!
----------------------------------------------------------------
⭐  이 비디오가 마음에 들면 구독하고 친구들과 공유하십시오. 우리는 계속해서 콘텐츠를 만들고 당신을 즐겁게하고 싶습니다 :

휴식을 원하십니까? Pandora Deepy 은 숙면에 관한 전문가와 고양이의 달래는 동영상을 볼 수 있는 최고의 장소입니다. 우리는 불면증으로 고통받는 사람들을 평화로운 잠으로 인도하기 위해 이완, 깊은 수면 및 정신 건강의 과학에 중점을 둡니다.

고양이 피아노, 숙면, 휴식에 관한 최고의 동영상을 보려면 Pandora Deepy에서 커뮤니티에 가입하세요. 채널 라이브러리를 탐색하여 매일 새로운 콘텐츠를 찾으십시오.

title: 상쾌하게 시작하는 아침을 위한 밝은 피아노 클래식 모음 | 밝은 피아노 | 상큼한 | 고음주의 |
description:
☁️ 포근한 테라스의 음악  '코튼테라스'입니다.

아침에 일어날 때 상쾌한 기분을 느끼게 해주는 클래식 피아노 모음집입니다. 들으면 기분이 좋아지는 밝고 산뜻한 클래식 음악들로 구성되 있습니다. 일부 곡 들은 분위기 통일을 위해 새로이 편곡되었습니다.  

코튼테라스에서는 영상을 앨범 단위로 업로드 하고 있습니다. 높은 퀄리티의 음악을 제공해 드리기 위해 새로운 컨셉에 맞는 곡들을 고르고 음원을 제작하기 때문에 업데이트 주기가 긴 편입니다. 모든 영상 하나하나에 정성이 들어가는 만큼 조금 긴 업데이트 시간 양해를 부탁합니다. 즐거운 감상 되세요~

🎵정식 음원출시!

코튼테라스의 세 번째 출시앨범  '피아노의테라스 - 나의 상쾌한 아침을 부탁해!' 앨범이 2022년 4월 27일에 정식 런칭하였습니다. 효과음 없이 깨끗한 원음과 리벨런싱 및 리마스터링한 고음질 사운드로 음악을 즐기실 수 있습니다.
유투브 음원과는 다른 고퀄 사운드의 정식 앨범 많이 사랑해 주세요!

멜론-https://www.melon.com/album/detail.htm?albumId=10933369
지니뮤직-https://www.genie.co.kr/detail/albumInfo?axnm=82658595
플로-https://www.music-flo.com/detail/album/edhdyyzez/albumtrack
벅스-https://music.bugs.co.kr/album/20464653?wl_ref=list_ab_01_ar
바이브-https://vibe.naver.com/album/7514003



🔔본 영상에 사용된 음원들은 코튼 테라스에서 리메이크 및 연주한 곡으로 감상용 이외의 용도로 사용하실 수 없습니다.

🔔 Please subscribe! - 구독과 좋아요는 영상제작에 많은 도움이 됩니다!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZrd...​

title: When  I dream💜Carol Kidd(캐롤 키드), 한글자막 (HD With Lyrics)🌴🌿🍒🌻🍓
description:
스코틀랜드 가수 Carol Kidd(캐롤 키드)가 1985년에 발표한 곡으로 1999년 개봉한 영화 ‘쉬리 OST’로 사용되면서 엄청난 인기를 얻었습니다. 원곡은 Crystal Gayle(크리스탈 게일)이 1975년 발표한 곡으로 크게 히트하지 못했죠. 원하는 것은 무엇이든 가질 수 있지만 누군지도 모르는 특별한 사람을 꿈꾸고 언젠가 내 눈앞에 현실로 나타나길 바라는 아름다운 노래입니다
🌴----------🌿(Lyrics)
I could build the mansion 
that is higher than the trees
난 저 나무들보다 더 높은 저택을 지을 수 있어요

I could have all the gifts 
I want and never ask please
애걸하지 않아도 원하는 건 뭐든지 가질 수 있어요

I could fly to Paris
It's at my beck and call
난 비행기를 타고 파리까지 날아갈 수도 있어요
언제든 마음만 먹으면 갈 수 있죠.

Why do I love my life alone
with nothing at all
왜 난 아무것도 없이 외로운 삶을 살고 있을까요?

But when I dream,
I dream of you
하지만 꿈을 꿀 때면, 당신을 꿈꾸지요

Maybe some day 
you will come true
어쩌면 언젠가 당신이 현실로 나타날지 몰라요

When I dream I dream of you
Maybe someday you will come true
난 꿈속에서 당신을 꿈꿔요
언젠가 당신은 현실이 되어 나타날 거에요.

I can be the singer 
or the clown in any role
난 어떤 배역도 다 하는 가수나 광대가 될 수 있어요

I can call up someone
to take me to the moon
누군가를 불러서 달에 데려가 달라고 할 수도 있죠

I can put my makeup on
and drive the man insane
화장을 하고 남자들을 애태우게 할 수도 있어요

I can go to bed alone
and never know his name
하지만 난 혼자 잠자리에 들고
그의 이름을 알지도 못해요

But when I dream,
I dream of you
그러나 꿈을 꿀 때면
당신을 꿈꾸지요

Maybe someday 
you will come true
어쩌면 언젠가 당신이
현실로 나타날지 몰라요

When I dream, 
I deam of you
꿈을 꿀 때면 
당신을 꿈꾸지요

Maybe someday 
you will cometrue
어쩌면 언젠가 
당신이 현실로 나타날지 몰라요

description:

description:
다들 한번쯤 들어봤을 유명한 오페라 뮤직 플레이리스트입니다. Be in the Moment와 함께 우아하고 교양 넘치는 오페라의 세계에 빠져보실까요?❤

00:00 Habanera - Georges Bizet 카르멘(Carmen)
04:17 La traviata - Giuseppe Verdi 라트라비아타
07:15 The barber of Seville - Gioacchino Rossini 세비야의 이발사
10:04 Queen of the night aria - Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart 마술피리(The magic flute) 밤의 여왕 아리아
13:08 La donna e mobile - Giuseppe Verdi 리골레토(rigoletto)
15:19 Aria der pamina - Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart 마술피리(The magic flute)
19:45 O Mio Babbino Caro- Giacomo Puccini 잔니 스키키(Gianni Schicchi)
22:14 Là ci darem la mano - Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart 돈 조반니(Don Giovanni)
25:40 Voi che sapete - Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart 피가로의 결혼(Le nozze di Figaro)
29:02 Symphony No. 9 in D minor: IV. Presto - Beethoven 베토벤 교향곡 9번 합창

title: 가볍게 틀어두기 좋은 활동음악 🐟 재미있고 유연한 멜로디
description:
활동시간에 틀어두기 좋은 피아노 음악입니다. 식사 시간, 놀이 시간, 목욕 시간, 이동 시간 등 다양한 활동 시간에 잘 어울려요. 오늘도 재미있고 유연한 멜로디와 함께하세요:)

"Gentle and joyful music."

title: 필름 콘서트까지 D-3기념! 2023신카이 마코토 오케스트라 콘서트 너의 이름은 파트 풀버전 공개
description:
필름콘서트는 이 영상보다 차원이 다르게 좋을 예정입니다..

구독자분들을 위한  공연 티켓증정 이벤트 진행!
(1인2매) 총 10명 한정!

🧡이벤트 참여 방법🧡
1.또모 인스타 그램 팔로우 (@towmoo_official)
2. '영상을 보신 후 '너의이름은 필름 콘서트' 공연 기대평 작성 (지금 이 영상 댓글에 달아주세요!)
3. 당첨자 발표는 1일 뒤 대댓글 및 하트로 달아드립니다!

”이 말을 하고 싶었어
네가 이 세상 어디에 있건
꼭 다시 만나러 갈 거라고..!”

너의 이름은. 필콘이 다시 여러분을 찾아갑니다!!💚

영화보다 더 강하게 가슴을 울리는 !!역대급!! 공연이
❛2월 9일, 롯데콘서트홀❜에서 펼쳐집니다💝

title: [2시간] PRAY - 깊은 기도로 인도하는 음악 / Deep Pray Music / Relaxation Music / Meditation Music / God with us
description:
[딤전4:5] 하나님의 말씀과 기도로 거룩하여짐이라

[1 Timothy 4:5, NLT] For we know it is made acceptable by the word of God and prayer.







이 음악은 여러분을 하나님과의 깊은 교제의 시간으로 인도합니다.
기도, 묵상, 치유, 예배, 공부, 휴식, 등을 위한 2시간의 피아노 음악입니다.
하나님의 사랑과 은혜, 그리고 평안이 여러분의 삶 속에 
항상 함께하길 원하는 마음으로 기도하며 만들었습니다.
여러분을 축복합니다.


This music leads you to a time of deep pray with God.
It is piano music for prayer, meditation, healing, worship, study, rest, 
God's love, grace, and peace in your life.
I made it by praying with the heart that I want to always be with.
Bless you all.




전심으로 (With All I Am)
내게 있는 향유 옥합 
나 무엇과도 주님을 바꾸지 않으리 (Heart and Soul)
목마른 사슴 (As the deer)




- 깊은 기도로 인도하는 음악( Deep Pray Music)

*MY GOD - Deep Pray Music / Relaxation Music / Meditation Music / my god
https://youtu.be/mTwsyeeC4qQ
*OFFERING - Deep Pray Music/Relaxation Music/Meditation Music/offer my life
https://youtu.be/4a5_htiyxDE
*PRAISE - Deep Pray Music / Relaxation Music / Meditation Music / PRAISE LORD
https://youtu.be/BvqiilTOkOY

description:

저작권 부자인 아이돌 지코가 127곡을 작곡했는데, 8살에 이미 200곡을 작곡해버린 천재 꼬마작곡가가 나타났습니다! 3살에 피아노를 치기 시작하고 6살에 작곡을 시작한 이 꼬마는 한국판 모차르트...?

심지어 피아노 학원 한 번 다닌 적 없고 집안에 음악을 하는 사람도 없는 이 꼬마의 재능은 도대체 어디서 온 건지...! 노래마다 감정을 한음 한음 담아서 듣는 이에게 생생하게 전달하는 놀라운 꼬마 작곡가의 노래를 감상하러 우와비와 함께 가보시죠!

title: 은혜아니면 외 50곡   Without His Grace...50 song  CCM 50
description:
고린도전서 15.10 
그러나 내가 나 된 것은 하나님의 은혜로 된 것이니 내게 주신 그의 은혜가 헛되지 아니하여 내가 모든 사도보다 더 많이 수고하였으나 내가 한 것이 아니요 오직 나와 함께 하신 하나님의 은혜로라

로마서 3.24 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 속량으로 말미암아 하나님의 은혜로 값 없이 의롭다 하심을 얻은 자 되었느니라  

디도서 3.7 
우리로 그의 은혜를 힘입어 의롭다 하심을 얻어 영생의 소망을 따라 상속자가 되게 하려 하심이라 

CCM 채널 최다 구독자, 최고의 찬양 보유채널 Beecompany!
주님께 드리는 찬양을 나누고자 전문음반회사에서 운영중인 채널입니다,
감사와 기쁨, 평안과 승리, 소망 그리고 회복이 필요할때 찬양으로 하나님께 영광돌리는 귀한 콘텐츠를 제공해 드리도록 노력하겠습니다.

title: (광고X) 강아지 심리안정과 휴식음악🐶💖강아지가좋아하는음악, 스트레스해소를 위해 외출할때 출근할때 꼭 틀어주세요
description:
(광고X) 강아지 심리안정과 휴식음악🐶💖강아지가좋아하는음악, 스트레스해소를 위해 외출할때 출근할때 꼭 틀어주세요

안녕하세요 "슬리피독스" 입니다.
나는 애완 동물이 긴장을 풀고 불안을 줄이고 스트레스를 줄이고 쉽게 잠을 잘 수 있도록 음악을 만들었습니다.
반려동물과 함께 편안하고 행복한 시간 보내시기 바랍니다!
----------------------
모든 음악은 직접 작.편곡 및 연주를 직접 하고 녹음해서 만듭니다.
모든 장르와 다양한컨텐츠 음악을 만들어 선보이겠습니다.
🌈구독과 👍🏻좋아요 🔔알림설정 해주신 구독자여러분. 모두 감사합니다.

🐶저작권 공지🐶
모든 음악 저작권은 “슬리피독스” 에 권한이 있으므로
불법 다운로드 및 상업적 사용을 금지합니다.  @2022

#강아지가좋아하는음악 #강아지음악 #강아지수면음악

description: Flatline - "When The Children Cry" - Official Compound Film THIS A SONG I WROTE FOR MY 9 YEAR OLD SON "TREY" WHO HAS AUTISM. HE IS MY WORLD! MY MISSION IN LIFE IS TO HELP MAKE HIM BETTER. I AM A PROUD FATHER AND WANTED TO WRITE THIS SONG FROM A PARENTS PERSPECTIVE. THIS SONG IS DEDICATED TO ALL THE CHILDREN AROUND THE WORLD WITH AUTISM. AND A BIG SALUTE TO THE PARENTS THAT STRUGGLE EVERYDAY WITH RAISING THESE AMAZING CHILDREN. ITS HARD WORK BUT WE WILL NOT GIVE UP ON OUR BABIES! THERE IS HOPE!!! HELP SPREAD AUTISM AWARENESS! - MOMMY AND DADDY LOVE YOU TREY "TAY-TAY" #TEAMTREY

title: Ms Rachel & Elmo Get Ready For School - ABC Song, Numbers, Colors - Toddler & Preschool Learning
description:
Get ready for school with Ms Rachel and Elmo! We are so excited to share this special video that’s packed with learning, key skills to prepare for preschool and kindergarten and fun kids songs and nursery rhymes! Join Ms Rachel and Elmo in singing, “This Is The Way We Go To School,” “The ABC Song” and practice 30 preschool skills! 

The episode starts with Ms Rachel helping Elmo with his morning routine before he goes off to school! They model each step to getting ready! Routines are so helpful for little ones! Some children benefit from visuals for each step. It can be helpful to practice your morning routine before school starts. 

Next Ms Rachel and Elmo sing their ABCs together. (The Alphabet Song) This is a great song for your little one to know before they start school. Some children only know the letters in order. Practice recognizing them out of order as well! 

Ms Rachel then models counting with cars and one to one correspondence, an important early math skill. Then we do our counting song, “1-20 Song.” Practice counting with your chid throughout the day, such as counting how many apples you are buying at the the store or how many stuffed animals your child is playing with. 

Next Ms Ashley does a fun game with the letter B and we sing our Phonics Song together. Ms Rachel created a motion for each letter which helps children with memorizing their letter sounds. 

Herbie then asks the children to help him figure out which words rhyme. Being able to identify and come up with rhymes is an important skill. 

Next Ms Rachel models what a full day of school might look like. When children know what to expect, they feel more comfortable with new situations. Ms Rachel also mentions throughout the video that the child’s grown up will be coming back to get them and they will go home at the end of the day. It may help to bring a laminated family photo or a special stuffy from home. 

Mr Aron then talks a bit about another preschool skill, opposites! 

Next Ms Rachel teaches the days of the week and the months of the year with a catchy “Days of the Week Song” and “Months of The Year Song.” Kids songs & nursery rhymes are so helpful for learning. 

We then talk once more about how first we go to school, then we go home at the end of the day. We are aiming with this video to help with butterflies and nervousness about being apart from parents and entering school. 

Then we sing the classic kids song, “The Wheels on the Bus” This song is so great for practicing imitation and gestures and it’s so fun! Get ready to dance along! 

Next Ms Rachel and Ashley model pretend play and teach the colors. Ms Rachel also models getting frustrated and taking a deep breath. As we mentioned, emotional regulation is such an important preschool skill. It’s actually the skill Kindergarten teachers said is the most important preschool skill in a survey. 

We then sing “Bubble, Bubble Pop” a fun kids song that teaches colors and numbers. 

Next Ms Ashley goes over how to raise your hand and plays a listening game. 

After that Ms Rachel quizzes the children on whether they know their first name, last name, middle name and full name. She also encourages children to start learning to write their name. Give your toddlers large crayons to color with to strengthen fine motor skills. 

Next we have a learning cartoon that practices knowing the concepts of same and different. 

Then we move to practicing all of our phonics sounds and gestures! We take breaks throughout the alphabet and sing fun kids songs and nursery rhymes such as “Bingo,” “Lazy Lion” and “I’m So Happy.” 

We go over sharing, trading and taking turns which are very important preschool prep skills that are often overlooked. When a child has good social skills and emotional regulation skills, they are more likely to succeed academically and make friends! Then we sing “I Could Be Your Friend” an original song! 

Then we go over our shapes with a fun elephant toy, which is a great math preschool skill. We sing our kids song, “Square Song.” We also sing “If You Should Meet an Elephant.” 

Next we talk about how it’s ok to have big feelings and sing our “Big Feelings” song. It’s normal to have big feelings, we just need tools to manage them. 

Ms Rachel ends by sharing some of her experience with the first day of school and with some loving encouragement to the children watching!

We hope you enjoyed Ms Rachel + Sesame Street as much as we did! 

This video is perfect for toddlers, preschoolers and even kindergarteners! Check out our channel for more toddler learning videos, toddler dance along videos, kids songs & nursery rhymes mixes and learn to read videos! We have videos for 2 year olds, 3 year olds, 4 year olds and 5 year olds! We absolutely love making toddler shows and we hope you enjoyed our program. 

#msrachel #elmo #kidssongs #nurseryrhymes #toddlerlearning #toddlers #preschool #preschoollearning

Let’s play ABC Quack! We’re going to sing the ABC song, but if we see a duck instead of a letter, we’re going to quack like a duck! Here we go!

A, B, C, D, E, F, G,
H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O, P,
Q, R, [QUACK],
T, U, V,
W, [QUACK],
Y, and Z.

Great quacking! Let’s try again!

A, B, C, D, E, F, [QUACK],
H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O [QUACK],
Q, R, S,
T, U, [QUACK],
W, X,
[QUACK] and Z.

Yikes, it’s getting a little harder. Here we go again!

A, B, C, [QUACK], E, F, G,
H, I, J, [QUACK], L, M, N, O, [QUACK],
Q, R, S,
[QUACK], U, [QUACK],
W, X,
Y, and [QUACK].

A, [QUACK], C, D, E, [QUACK], G,
H, [QUACK], J, [QUACK], L, M, N, O, P,
[QUACK], R, S,
T, [QUACK], V,
W, [QUACK],
[QUACK], and [QUACK].

A, B, [QUACK], [QUACK], E, F, [QUACK],
H, [QUACK], J, K, [QUACK], [QUACK], [QUACK], [QUACK], [QUACK],
Q, [QUACK], [QUACK],
[QUACK], [QUACK], [QUACK],
W, [QUACK],
Y, and Z. [QUACK!]

title: ITSY BITSY SPIDER - Song for Children
description:
Why is Itsy Bitsy Spider trying to climb up the waterspout? Is he going to reach the rooftop? Find out in this fun video!

Children all over the world absolutely adore Itsy Bitsy Spider, also known as Incy Wincy Spider.
In this popular nursery rhyme, a spider climbs up the waterspout, but rain keeps pushing him down. Who can help Itsy Bitsy? Is he going to succeed?

Enjoy this unique and original version of a traditional song. It’s suitable for babies, toddllers, children, kids and parents alike!

°°°°°
Thank you so much for watching this video and for sharing it!

New songs are coming soon. To make sure you get all the latest videos, SUBSCRIBE NOW! http://bit.ly/1jDE3Eo

°°°°°
Twinkle Little Songs are videos of popular nursery rhymes and children's songs, with a special touch.

Babies, toddlers, children and kids (and, of course, parents!) can all enjoy these videos and learn something new while having fun.

°°°°°
Itsy Bitsy Spider - Suggested Educational Activities:

With babies and toddlers:
- Meet Itsy Bitsy (Incy Wincy), the ultra-cute and brave spider
- Discuss how the weather can change
- Discuss how Itsy Bitsy tries to overcome obstacles
- Cheer when the spider finally succeeds!

With children and kids: 
- Learn to sing this beautiful, enchanting song
- Ask questions like “why does the spider keep climbing up?"
- Learn more about spiders
- Discuss the effects of rain and sun on the landscape
- Discuss how perseverance is rewarded
- Have fun!

°°°°°
Itsy Bitsy Spider - Song Lyrics: 
(To turn captions on, enable them in the YouTube player)

Itsy bitsy spider went up the waterspout.
Down came the rain
and washed the spider out.
Out came the sunshine
and dried up all the rain
and itsy bitsy spider climbed up the spout again.
(x4)

°°°°°
Check out more videos!

title: Little Snowflake | Kids Songs | Super Simple Songs
description:
Get the Super Simple App!  ► http://bit.ly/TheSuperSimpleApp
Little Snowflake brings together the same team that created the Twinkle Twinkle Little Star video to tell a short story of a snowman brought to life by the magic and beauty of snowfall. As he tries to ice skate, he learns the value of perseverance and teamwork. Along the way, we get to learn and review parts of the body (head, nose, hand). We hope you love it!

—————LiaChaCha—————
Welcome to LiaChaCha, where we invite you into the world of Lia and ChaCha, adorable twins navigating the ups and downs of siblinghood. Join us as we explore their playful interactions, from squabbles to moments of sibling love, and witness how they navigate relationships with their sibling, relatives, and friends.

At LiaChaCha, we believe that learning is most effective when it's enjoyable. That's why we curate content that not only entertains but also imparts valuable lessons, making the learning experience both fun and enriching. Our videos are crafted to help toddlers connect with everyday life in an exciting way, fostering discovery and learning through play.

Join us on LiaChaCha, where parents and babies come together for a unique experience of connection, education, and shared laughter. Let's learn, grow, and make memories together!

Little Treehouse Nursery Rhymes & Kids Songs is home to popular baby songs that educate & entertain toddlers & preschoolers through music & story-telling! Children can dance & sing along to classic & new rhymes for kids & cartoon songs like Baby Shark, Wheels on the Bus, Johny Johny Yes Papa, Five Little Monkeys & more!

Little Treehouse follows the adventures of a trio of siblings & their furry friends as they play, learn & explore the world around them through catchy songs and popular nursery rhymes. 

From visiting a farm to going under the sea or even traveling to space, these siblings educate and entertain young minds while nurturing creativity and sparking imagination. Through its whimsical settings, charming characters and lively music, learning with Little Treehouse becomes a joy for preschoolers and toddlers. 

Our animated videos & kids songs have been created to make learning & education fun, impart family values & encourage healthy habits while entertaining our babies, toddlers & preschoolers. Parents will realise that Little Treehouse Nursery Rhymes & Kids Songs is the ideal destination to acquire knowledge, thinking skills & develop their child’s imagination & creativity.

Parents will also enjoy our YouTube learning videos created for kids with preschool songs, funny cartoons & popular lullabies. Preschoolers, toddlers & babies can learn letters, numbers, animal sounds, colors, shapes & more with our educational videos for kids!

Autonomous sensory meridian response (ASMR) is an experience characterized by a static-like or tingling sensation on the skin that typically begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine.

title: 【Music＃611】Marvel Spider-Man Oody satisfying ASMR #shorts #satisfying #asmr @marblerun-asmr
description:
この動画はColorfulな木琴や鉄琴とプラスチックボールや木製ボールで色々なキャラクターなどを購入して動画にしました。
家族みんなで学べて楽しめるように動画を作成しました。

撮影場所は自宅で撮影しています。
すべて手作業で企画、撮影、編集しています。

https://youtube.com/@marblerun-asmr?si=a4ZA5cqkRCJ9c42l

Twitter
https://mobile.twitter.com/MarbleRun_ASMR

【この動画で学べる事】
スキルの向上：形状認識、論理的思考、問題解決能力、手と目の調整能力、細かい運動能力の発達に役立ちます。
 
色の認識：視覚感覚スキルを刺激し、複数の色で作られ、色の知覚を高め、発達の成長を促進します。 
家族のコミュニケーションを促進：このおもちゃは親子で一緒に遊ぶことができるため、親子の関係を強化し絆を強めることができます。

【ASMR作品の編集作業】
独自のコンテンツとなるように自分自身の手作業で企画と編集をしています。ぬ
購入したロジカルルートパズルと木製のカップでいろいろな文字をなどを作成しています。

title: 🔴 당신을 5분만에 잠들게 할 부드러운 빗소리 / 수면과 휴식을 위한 자연의 백색소음 / 자장가, 불면증 해결, 깊은 잠, 집중력 향상
description:
조용히 내리는 비는 당신의 긴장을 풀고 깊은 잠을 줄 것입니다.

[빗소리와 수면의 관계]
빗소리를 들으면 뇌파 중 델타파에 에너지가 집중된다.
델타파는 깊은 수면에서 지배적인 뇌파입니다.
이 시점에서 뇌는 많은 치료적 성장 호르몬을 방출할 것입니다.
빗소리는 우리 몸의 자율신경을 자극하여 마음을 진정시키고 숙면에 도움을 줍니다.
백색소음의 자연스러운 소리 중 빗소리는 깊은 잠을 유도한다.
빗소리는 숙면 유도, 불면증 해소, 스트레스 감소,
집중력 향상 및 수면 장애 극복에 도움이 됩니다.
나는 당신에게 행복과 평화를 기원합니다.

🟢 인스타그램 - https://www.instagram.com/relaxingtimeforyou/
🟢 틱톡 - https://www.tiktok.com/@relaxingtimeforyou?lang=en-US
🟢 페이스북 - https://www.facebook.com/sdhjoong/

🎧 볼륨을 적절하게 조절하여 더 나은 소리를 냅니다.
.

🍀구독과 좋아요는 여러분의 따뜻한 마음입니다.
    영상제작에 큰 도움이 됩니다.
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKptJ-XQRf_4X4ZY9Cr_75Q

🍀당신의 편안한 경험을 방해할 수 있으므로 내 채널의 비디오에 단어를 추가하지 않습니다.
영상 만드는 방법은 '비하인드'를 참고해주세요.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v7JUEk0Y3z0

🍀비디오 편집 및 장비
모든 콘텐츠는 내가 만들고 완성합니다.
비디오 및 오디오는 현장에서 직접 촬영 및 녹음됩니다.
드문 경우지만 After Effects에서 비디오/사진을 결합하여
새롭고 창의적인 것을 만드십시오.
 ◻️동영상: sony a6400, sony a6600, dgi air2로 촬영했습니다.
 ◻️오디오: 줌 h5n, 줌 h4n pro로 녹음하세요.
 ◻️소프트웨어: primierepro2020, 애프터 이펙트, 파이널컷으로 편집, 믹스 및 마스터링.

🍀면책 조항
"당신을 위한 편안한 시간" 채널은 수면 보조 채널이며 의학적 조언이나 치료를 대신할 수 없습니다.
심각한 질병이나 과로로 인한 수면 장애가 있는 경우에는 반드시 의사와 상담하십시오.

 🚫 경고 🚫
본인 채널의 릴랙싱 타임 영상 및 오디오의 무단 복제 및 재사용을 금합니다.
동영상 및 오디오를 무단으로 재사용하는 경우 YouTube 수익 정책 위반으로 제재를 받을 수 있습니다.
🚫 경고 🚫
'릴랙싱 타임 포 유' 채널의 영상 및 음성을 복사하거나 재사용하는 것을 금지합니다.
동영상 및 오디오를 무단으로 재사용하는 경우 YouTube 수익 정책 위반으로 제재를 받을 수 있습니다.

#편안한시간 #빗소리 #수면 #빗소리
숙면을 위한 빗소리, 편안한 비, 뇌우, 잠이 오는 빗소리,
집중력, 숙면, 수면 ASMR, 스트레스 해소,
불면증 해소, 명상, 요가, 힐링, 릴렉스,공부,시험공부
백색소음으로 집중력 향상 ,자연의소리,빗소리로 잠 잘자는법.

title: Relaxing Sounds for SLEEP, STUDY, and MEDITATION ASMR Music | TonalASMR | FRISSON
description:
This video highlights the tonal sounds of the Vibraphone, a mallet percussion instrument, with the goal of helping one kick back and relax, sleep or study, or even meditate. Please enjoy, and like and subscribe for more future videos! There will be more instruments as well!

Frisson is much like chills, similar to the sensation of ASMR: a sensation of pleasant tingly waves traveling through the body. Frisson is a term used to describe this sensation when triggered by music.

Similar to the Xylophone, the Vibraphone has piano-like keys that are struck with mallets. The Vibraphone has aluminum bars and a damper pedal to control the sustain of the instrument. It is often used in both jazz and orchestral music.

The musical content in this video is improvisational.

If you enjoyed this video, please leave a comment about which part was your favorite, so we can create more content together!

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

Hello! 🦥

We are Alessio and Noemi, an Italian couple who go the extra mile to help people who, like us, have some difficulty falling asleep, concentrating, or simply relaxing 🙂

We stumbled upon the world of white noise in 2016 during our university studies and used to study with the sound of a hairdryer in our headphones 🎧

White noises, in fact, including the sound of a hairdryer but not only, repeat regularly and without interruptions, managing to cancel out surrounding noises and produce a relaxing effect on the mind and body. White noises are used to reduce stress, enhance concentration, promote sleep, and even alleviate tinnitus 😀

But why keep the magical recipe just to ourselves to truly make the most of moments of relaxation and harness this well-being in studying, working, and private life as well? ✨

Welcome to #OnlyASMR 😴

title: Mushroom Music • Fall Asleep in 3 Minutes • Relieve Stress, Anxiety,and Depression • MELATONIN BOOST
description:
Mushroom Music • Sleep Instantly Within 3 Minutes - Insomnia Healing, Stress Relief - Brain Massage 🍄🎶
Welcome to an enchanting realm where nature's beauty and tranquility merge to create a perfect ambiance for relaxation and deep sleep. This video, "Mushroom Music • Sleep Instantly Within 3 Minutes - Insomnia Healing, Stress Relief - Brain Massage," features mesmerizing visuals of glowing mushrooms and soothing music designed to help you relax, reduce stress, and achieve a restful night's sleep. 🌌🍄

About the Video
This video is a beautiful combination of high-definition 4K visuals and calming music, meticulously crafted to promote deep sleep and mental well-being. The enchanting scene of bioluminescent mushrooms in a magical forest, reflecting on a serene pond, creates an atmosphere of wonder and tranquility. The vibrant colors and gentle light of the mushrooms enhance the calming effect, making it easier to drift into a peaceful slumber. 🌺🌲

Key Features
Instant Sleep Induction: The soothing music and tranquil visuals help you fall asleep within just 3 minutes. The gentle rhythms and calming melodies are designed to slow down your brain waves, leading you into a state of deep relaxation. 💤
Insomnia Healing: If you struggle with insomnia, this video offers a natural remedy. The peaceful sounds and serene visuals work together to quiet your mind, reduce anxiety, and promote a deep, restful sleep. 🌿
Stress Relief: The combination of calming music and enchanting visuals helps to melt away stress, providing a mental escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. 🌸
Brain Massage: Experience a mental rejuvenation as the gentle sounds and beautiful visuals create a brain massage effect, easing tension and promoting a sense of well-being. 🧠✨
Visuals
The video showcases a mystical forest illuminated by glowing mushrooms in hues of blue, purple, and pink. The bioluminescent fungi reflect beautifully on the calm pond, creating a magical and serene environment. The detailed 4K resolution captures every nuance, from the intricate patterns on the mushroom caps to the soft glow of the ambient light, making this a visually captivating experience. 🌺✨

Music
The soundtrack features a blend of ambient and meditative music, designed to calm the mind and promote relaxation. The gentle melodies and soothing rhythms are ideal for reducing stress and helping you drift off to sleep. The music flows seamlessly with the visuals, creating a harmonious and calming atmosphere. 🎶🌿

Benefits
Improved Sleep Quality: Helps you fall asleep faster and enjoy a deeper, more restorative sleep.
Reduced Anxiety and Stress: Provides relief from the stresses of daily life, promoting a sense of well-being.
Enhanced Relaxation: Creates a peaceful environment that allows you to unwind and de-stress.
Call to Action
If you find peace and relaxation in this video, please leave a comment and share your experience. Your feedback helps us create more content that caters to your needs. Don't forget to subscribe to our channel and hit the like button to stay updated with our latest videos. 🌟💖

title: ✨🧜🏻‍♀️ Mermaid Siren’s Pool | Fantasy Music & ASMR Bubbles | Sleep, Study or Relaxation | 10 Hours
description:
For Nina, forever my little mermaid 💖

Many have heard of mermaids that live in the deep blue sea, the ones that call to the young sailors in their mighty ships. But few know about the ones that live deep within the forest. Indeed, these mermaids are the most mysterious and  magical of them all. They live among the fae folk and the peaceful forest creatures, often singing to them when the moon is full and the stars fill their eyes. At times they’ll even come up to greet the fairies at the water’s edge and sparkle in the moonlight. If you ever find yourself in an enchanted forest and discover a bubbling pool, step back and wait for a glimpse of the forest mermaid siren. You may just hear her sing and see her sparkle. But also beware, her song just may enchant you and you may never want to leave.

We hope you enjoy The Mermaid Siren’s Pool, whether you need it for sleep, relaxation or focus. Thank you for joining us for another SoundExpanse fantasy ambiance experience. Please like and subscribe if you enjoy our videos and let us know where you’d like to go next. We love having you stop by and share your thoughts, we are deeply grateful. 

This scene was composed by combining imagery created with Ai enhanced illustration and layered animated effects in After Effects. 

All of our productions are Copyright. We do not give permission to copy or reuse our audio or visual content.

Thanks again,
The SoundExpanse

title: Sweet Dreams Baby ♫ Brahms Soothing Lullaby ♫ Sleep Music for Newborns😴Relaxing Baby Sleep
description:
Sweet Dreams Baby ♫ Brahms Soothing Lullaby ♫ Sleep Music for Newborns😴Relaxing Baby Sleep
We all struggle being parent to put our babies to sleep. In most cases only few of us might be lucky of getting baby who sleeps easily. And specially to the newborn babies who needs plenty of sleep time for their development. Fairy Bee Lullaby has made lullabies to put your babies to sleep in an easy way so that all the parents will be peace of mind when baby sleeps. Our Sleep music are not only for babies but also for the parents who are tired and don’t get enough time to sleep because of their babies. So, we think of not only to babies but to the parents as well. Fairy Bee Lullaby helps babies to go to sleep, it’s soothing lullabies and relaxing baby music make them sleep in peace. We also suggest our lullabies to use in children’s study which helps them to concentrate on their reading. Just by playing in low volume the lullabies for babies to study when kids are studying it helps to concentrate more and helps to study.


What is lullaby?
Lullabies a songs and music that helps our babies to go to sleep. They not only help to sleep but also helps on their development. Lullabies are used in various forms and melodies around the world from ancient times to calm and make the babies go to sleep faster. We have classic music compositions for babies like Brahms, Beethoven, Mozart, and ancient compositions from around the world which has been practiced from 100s of years back. We also have popular rhymes melodies from around the world which helps babies to love the music which has been loved by many babies. We try to make the music in different patterns so that they get different musical instrument experience and melodies so that your babies go to sleep faster. 

So why Lullabies are important?
The gentle melody and calming lullaby music of Lullabies can help promote relaxation and calmness in babies and make babies go to sleep quicker. Relaxing and soft music for babies promotes comfort, quality sleep, and brain development. Lullaby is very essential to good and soothing sleep for babies. So, lullabies are baby sleep music that helps babies to go to sleep.

Play our Fairy Bee Lullabies for your babies at low volume with all the benefits of music. We hope you will love our lullaby music🎼

description:

Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star, and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

_______________________________________________
© El Bebe Productions Limited - part of LittleBabyBum


Playing music creates a relaxing environment for your child. The feelings of comfort and security act as triggers to let them know that it’s time to get some rest. The slow rhythm and tempo of bedtime music slows children’s heartbeat and calms their breath. The slow and comforting rhythm also less likely to trigger your child’s threat response. It gives them the feeling of security and safety.

We recommend putting on your favorite relaxing music around half an hour before bed or nap time. Allowing time to absorb the music and wind down before sleeping. You can use it to fall asleep and you can keep it on all night to sleep better.


♫ BENEFITS OF LITTLE BABY BUM LULLABIES:

💖Improved sleep quality

 and oxytocin

Little Baby Bum is an animated musical show that celebrates early childhood experiences and supports cognitive development through loveable characters, relatable stories and the magic of song, repetition, rhythm, and rhyme.

title: Sleep Instantly Within 3 Minutes ♫ Baby Sleep Music ♥ Brahms And Beethoven ♥ Mozart Brahms Lullaby
description:
Sleep Instantly Within 3 Minutes ♫ Baby Sleep Music ♥ Brahms And Beethoven ♥ Mozart Brahms Lullaby. https://youtu.be/CpnsQMRBanE

=========================

Achieve instant relaxation and sleep within 3 minutes with "Baby Sleep Music: Brahms and Beethoven, Mozart Brahms Lullaby." This specially curated collection blends the soothing melodies of Brahms and Beethoven with the timeless Brahms Lullaby and Mozart's calming compositions, creating an ideal atmosphere for your baby to unwind and drift off to sleep effortlessly.

The gentle harmonies and tranquil rhythms of Brahms and Beethoven are known for their ability to calm the mind and promote relaxation. Combined with the comforting notes of Brahms' Lullaby and Mozart's soothing melodies, this music creates a serene sleep environment that helps reduce anxiety and prepare your baby for a peaceful night's rest.

Designed to aid in achieving instant sleep, this collection provides a consistent and soothing soundscape. The soft, melodic tunes serve as natural white noise, masking external disturbances and ensuring uninterrupted sleep for your baby.

Whether it's naptime or bedtime, "Baby Sleep Music: Brahms and Beethoven, Mozart Brahms Lullaby" offers a gentle and effective solution to help your baby relax and fall asleep quickly. Embrace the calming power of classical music and create a tranquil sleep routine that promotes deep and restful sleep for your little one.

title: Bedtime Lullabies Collection - 1 Hour Long - by Leigha Marina
description:
Immerse your child in a calm, peaceful world with Leigha Marina's captivating one-hour-long bedtime lullabies. This carefully selected playlist consists of 18 gentle lullaby songs with charming cartoon animations featuring cute little penguins. The soft rhythms and soothing melodies provide the ideal ambiance for a restful night's sleep.

This music collection comprises nursery rhymes designed to help your child fall into a comfortable and relaxed slumber. Each song is an original, heartwarming piece thoughtfully selected to make bedtime a delightful and calming experience. The playlist lasts a full hour, ensuring uninterrupted tranquility that will soon become essential to your nightly routine.

Enjoy a symphony of lullabies, sleep music, nursery rhymes, and children's melodies as they form a haven of comfort for your child. The charming animations featuring delightful penguins add a touch of whimsy to the experience, captivating young minds and enhancing the soothing power of the music.
